title: Canada Higher Education House
description: A site for researching and applying for scholarships in canada
heading: Apply For A Scholarship
description: CHEH is a member driven organization aimed at promoting Canadian higher education and enabling Canadians and international student to attend the University and program of their choice. Should you be selected for a scholarship, CHEH will credit your student account at your chosen institution once proof of registration is received. For now your task is: complete the online application form including the short essay on ‘why I want to attend a Canadian University’. CHEH will notify winners of their awards and then arrange to credit winners’ student account with scholarship funds upon receipt of proof of registration. Good luck.
